column4: Hello, I have installed an own kernel. Now I need lircd modules which are built against my own kernel. dpkg-reconfigure lirc-modules-source gives me: Error! Could not locate lirc_atiusb.ko for module lirc in the DKMS tree.
You must run a dkms build for kernel 2.6.29.4 (i686) first.
custom kernels are not supported here
